title: Old 1v1.lol
description: The old version of 1v1.lol, a 3rd person shooter game.

title: New 1v1.lol
description: The new and updated version of 1v1.lol, a 3rd person shooter game.

title: Slope
description: An endless game where you roll a ball and avoid obstacles!

title: Mini Golf Master
description: A mini golf game where you pass levels and gradually get to the last hole!

title: Basketball Stars
description: A game where you cross people's ankles and play as your favorite characters from the NBA!

title: Brawl Stars
description: A fake version of brawl stars, we couldn't get the real one. Just shoot people and get gems.
